long_description: The Osprey Comet daypack bridges the gap between your work day and after-work play. Whether you're carrying a laptop and papers or rain gear and food, the Comet provides comfort and attractive style. Airscape(TM)-style back panel with ridged foam padding provides cushion and ventilation; well-padded shoulder straps are covered with spacer mesh. Removable 20mm webbing waist strap; sternum strap with whistle buckle. Panel-loading main compartment has a multifunction, bottom-padded sleeve; it holds up to a 15.4 in.laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Also includes a document sleeve, MP3 pocket and zippered mesh storage pocket. 2 vertical-zip front-panel pockets with key fob keep everyday gear sorted and close at hand; also includes a horizontal top pocket. 2 side stretch-mesh pockets; single ice axe loop provides a place to lash on tools. Padded top grab handle adds a convenient way to carry the pack the Osprey Comet daypack.
short_description: The Osprey Comet daypack bridges the gap between your work day and after-work play. Whether you're carrying a laptop and papers or rain gear and food, the Comet provides comfort and attractive style.
